conversion_verification.notes: Successful conversion to an isometric cutaway 3D model with clear depth and volume.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear wall thickness and volume. Very minor perspective distortion on outer edges.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly faithful layout. All room relationships and wall positions match the 2D plan precisely.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is highly accurate to the source plan, including kitchen counters and bathroom fixtures.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with logical lighting. No UI contamination or text artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Minor mismatch in window pane count compared to the 2D plan's glass indicators.

summary: A remarkably faithful and geometrically precise 3D conversion that maintains nearly perfect layout fidelity from the 2D floor plan.
